Note:
This map is made to prepare Apocalypse armies for the BaconCatBug Gaming Template v2.0 or later versions.

This could be useful for preparing your army in the spare time and having multiple armies ready. Also an easy way to build Command Asset decks.

Although it is not needed and you can bring you army by grabbing it from the saved objects, this method keeps things clean and organized and ensures that will be no mess when importing armies as they will be placed by script in the right position of the table.

Read the Notepad for the instructions.

This tool map is made by [BCS]Phubar

function refreshMat()
    mat = getObjectFromGUID("c35ec8")
end


function writeImageMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    createLockButton()
    self.createButton(imageUpBtn)
    self.createButton(imageDownBtn)
end

function imageUp()
    imageSelected=imageSelected+1
    if imageSelected > #matImage then
        imageSelected=1
    end
    changeImageMat()
end

function imageDown()
    imageSelected=imageSelected-1
    if imageSelected < 1 then
        imageSelected=#matImage
    end
    changeImageMat()
end

function changeImageMat()
    local custom = mat.getCustomObject()
    custom.image=matImage[imageSelected]
    mat.setCustomObject(custom)
    mat.reload()
    Wait.frames(refreshMat,10)
end

function none()
end

function createLockButton()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'showYNButtons'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = label0
    button_parameters.position = {0,offsetYBtn,0.9+offsetBtn}

    button_parameters.height = 300*scaleBtn
    button_parameters.font_size = 120*scaleBtn

    button_parameters.font_color = 'White'

end

function createLockButton2()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'none'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = "Are you sure?"
    button_parameters.position = {0,offsetYBtn,0.9+offsetBtn}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,0,0}

    button_parameters.height = 300*scaleBtn
    button_parameters.font_size = 120*scaleBtn

function createNoButton()
    button_parameters = {}

function createYesButton()

    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = 'Yes'
    button_parameters.position = {2,offsetYBtn,3+offsetBtn}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,0,0}
    button_parameters.width = 300*scaleBtn
    button_parameters.height = 300*scaleBtn
    button_parameters.font_size = 120*scaleBtn
    self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function showYNButtons()
    if YNButtons == false then
        self.clearButtons()
        createLockButton2()
        createYesButton()
        createNoButton()
        self.createButton(imageUpBtn)
        self.createButton(imageDownBtn)
        YNButtons= true
    end
end

function hideYNButtons()
    if YNButtons== true then
        self.clearButtons()
        createLockButton()
        self.createButton(imageUpBtn)
        self.createButton(imageDownBtn)
        YNButtons=false
    end
end

function extract(obj, player_color, alt)
    Player[player_color].lookAt({position={-126,0.75,0}, pitch=80, yaw= 90, distance=130})
    spawnPlayZone()
    Wait.frames(extract2, 3)
end

function extract2()
    local allObj=getAllObjects()
    local zoneObj=playZone.getObjects()



    for i, objA in ipairs(allObj) do
        local delete=true
        for j, objZ in ipairs (zoneObj) do
            if objA == objZ or objA == self or objA == matUrlDisplay then
                delete=false
                objZ.setLock(true)
            end
        end
        if delete then
            objA.destroy()
        end
    end
    --[[

    ]]
    deleteTable()
end

function deleteTable()
    local guidList = {
        "afc863","c8edca","393bf7","12c65e","f938a2","9f95fd","35b95f",
        "5af8f2","4ee1f2","bd69bd", "28865a", "9f95fd"
    }
    guidList = {}
    for i, tbl in ipairs(guidList) do
        getObjectFromGUID(tbl).destroy()
    end
    table.destroy()
    local posX=0
    local posY=0
    local posZ=0
    local offsetX=-226
    for k, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        posX=obj.getPosition().x+offsetX
        posY=obj.getPosition().y
        posZ=obj.getPosition().z
        obj.setPosition({posX,posY,posZ})
    end

    self.destroy()
end


function spawnPlayZone()
    playZoneData.position={mat.getPosition().x,mat.getPosition().y+10,mat.getPosition().z}
    playZone=spawnObject(playZoneData)
end

parentBagGUID="ciccio"
destroy=true

selected = false

transparency=0.8
unselectedColor={0.4,0,0,transparency} -- red
unselectedColor={1,1,1,0.1} -- invisible
selectedColor={0,0.5,0,transparency}



cardBtn={
    label=self.getName(), click_function="cardFunction", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.5,-0.87}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=150, width=900,
    font_size=90, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardBtn={
    label="", click_function="cardFunction", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.5,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=1300, width=1030,
    font_size=90, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

function onLoad()

    if self.getGUID() ~= "b7d472" then
        showButton()
        --self.setScale({1.7,0.1,1.7})
    else
        self.setScale({1,1,1})
        self.setScale({0.3,0.3,0.3})
    end

    --self.interactable=false
end

function cardFunction()
    local parentBag=getObjectFromGUID(parentBagGUID)
    local parendBuilderGUID=parentBag.getVar("deckBuilderGUID")
    local parendBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(parendBuilderGUID)

    if selected == false then -- add card
        if parendBuilder.getVar("numberSelectedCards") == 30 then
            printToAll("CARD LIMIT REACHED", "Red")
            return
        end
        self.editButton({index=0, color=selectedColor})
        parentBag.call("addCard",{name=self.getName()})
        selected=true
    else --remove card
        self.editButton({index=0, color=unselectedColor})
        parentBag.call("removeCard", {name=self.getName()})
        selected=false
    end
end

function showButton()
    self.createButton(cardBtn)
end

function destroyself()
     self.destroy()
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr
	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]
		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end

    end

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do
        splitted={}
        for word in (card.name .. "-"):gmatch("([^-]*)-") do
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, word)
        end

        factionName=splitted[1]
        cardName=splitted[2]
        powerName=splitted[#splitted]
        if cardName==" PSYCHIC POWER " then
            card.name= "00"..factionName.."-"..powerName
        end
    end
    cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )
    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do
        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1

        --    local taken2  = taken.clone({position = spawnedItemPosition2, rotation={0,self.getRotation().y-90,0}})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})

            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())

--    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)

end

end

-- Return position "position" in "object"'s frame of reference
-- (most likely the only function you want to directly access)
function LocalPos(object, position)
    local rot = object.getRotation()
    local lPos = {position[1], position[2], position[3]}

    -- Z-X-Y extrinsic
    local zRot = RotMatrix('z', rot['z'])
    lPos = RotateVector(zRot, lPos)
    local xRot = RotMatrix('x', rot['x'])
    lPos = RotateVector(xRot, lPos)
    local yRot = RotMatrix('y', rot['y'])
    lPos = RotateVector(yRot, lPos)

    return Vect_Sum(lPos, object.getPosition())
end

-- Build rotation matrix
-- 1st table = 1st row, 2nd table = 2nd row etc
function RotMatrix(axis, angDeg)
    local ang = math.rad(angDeg)
    local cs = math.cos
    local sn = math.sin

    if axis == 'x' then
        return {
                    { 1,        0,             0 },
                    { 0,   cs(ang),   -1*sn(ang) },
                    { 0,   sn(ang),      cs(ang) }
               }
    elseif axis == 'y' then
        return {
                    {    cs(ang),   0,   sn(ang) },
                    {          0,   1,         0 },
                    { -1*sn(ang),   0,   cs(ang) }
               }
    elseif axis == 'z' then
        return {
                    { cs(ang),   -1*sn(ang),   0 },
                    { sn(ang),      cs(ang),   0 },
                    { 0,                  0,   1 }
               }
    end
end

-- Apply given rotation matrix on given vector
-- (multiply matrix and column vector)
function RotateVector(rotMat, vect)
    local out = {0, 0, 0}
    for i=1,3,1 do
        for j=1,3,1 do
            out[i] = out[i] + rotMat[i][j]*vect[j]
        end
    end
    return out
end

-- Sum of two vectors (of any size)
function Vect_Sum(vec1, vec2)
    local out = {}
    local k = 1
    while vec1[k] ~= nil and vec2[k] ~= nil do
        out[k] = vec1[k] + vec2[k]
        k = k+1
    end
    return out
end

showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")

        end
    end
end

    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

    cardFunction(1)
end

    cardFunction(2)

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end

    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end

        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end

        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}

        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)

            taken.setName("")

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)

        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name

            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")

showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
showThumbnails=false

deckBuilderGUID="d1667e"

titleBtn={}
cardBtn={}
selectedCardList={}

cardNumber=0

unselectedColor={0.4,0,0} -- red
selectedColor={0,0.5,0}

unselectedFont=150
selectedFont=unselectedFont+1

columnLimit=3
rowLimit=4

YBntPos=4.5

titleBtn[1]={
    label=string.sub(self.getName(),4), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={3,YBntPos,0} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,270,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=600, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, scale={1.5,1.5,1.5}
}
templateCardBtn={
    label="", click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1,-5} --[[ auto set in writeMenus() function ]], rotation={0,180,0}, height=500, width=1800,
    font_size=unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor, font_color={1,1,1}
}

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

cardScript=""


function onLoad()
    cardMasterScriptObj=getObjectFromGUID("b7d472")
    cardMasterScript=cardMasterScriptObj.getLuaScript()
    --cardMasterScript=""
    --self.setPosition({self.getPosition().x,2.5,self.getPosition().z})
    deckBuilder=getObjectFromGUID(deckBuilderGUID)
    ciccio=self.getObjects()
    if false then
        for i, ccc in ipairs(ciccio) do
            local taken = self.takeObject({guid = ccc.guid, position ={0,20,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, scale={1,1,1}, smooth=false})
            for j=1, 9 do
                local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-30,0}})
                replace.setName(replace.getName().." # "..j)
                self.putObject(replace)
            end
            self.putObject(taken)
        end
    end

    --writeMenuR()
end

function writeMenuR()
    showThumbnails=true
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end
function writeMenu(params)
    showThumbnails=params.thumbnails
    Wait.frames(writeMenu2, 5)
end

function reverse (arr)
	local i, j = 1, #arr

	while i < j do
		arr[i], arr[j] = arr[j], arr[i]

		i = i + 1
		j = j - 1
	end
end

function writeMenu2()
    self.createButton(titleBtn[1])
    decksInside=self.getObjects()
    cardsInside=self.getObjects()

    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        cardNumber=cardNumber+1
    end
    local actualRowPosition=0
    local actualRowCount=1
    local sort_func = function ( a,b ) return a.name < b.name end
    --cardsInside=table.sort(cardsInside,  sort_func )


    for i, card in ipairs(cardsInside) do

        actualRowPosition=actualRowPosition+1
        if actualRowPosition> rowLimit then
            actualRowPosition=1
            actualRowCount=actualRowCount+1
        end
        local Xpos=0
        local Zpos=0

        local spawnedItemPosition={}
        local bagPos=self.getPosition()
        local cards= self.getObjects()
        table.insert(cardBtn, i, templateCardBtn)
        if showThumbnails then -- BOTTONI GRANDI E CARTE
            Zpos= (rowLimit-1)*(cardSize[1]/2+0.5) - (actualRowPosition-1)*(cardSize[1]+1)
            Xpos= -3.5-(cardSize[2]/2) - (actualRowCount-1)*(cardSize[2]+1)
            spawnedItemPosition= {bagPos.x+Xpos,bagPos.y+3.5,bagPos.z+Zpos}



            local taken  = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid, position = spawnedItemPosition, rotation={0,270,0}, --[[scale={cardSize[1]/11.67,0.1,cardSize[2]/8.67},]] smooth=false})

            local replace= taken.clone({position={0,-20,0}})




            --taken.setScale({cardSize[2]*0.41,0.1,cardSize[1]*0.32})
            taken.setScale({cardSize[1]*0.24,0.1,cardSize[2]*0.31})
            taken.setLock(true)
            taken.setName("")
            --taken.setLuaScript("destroy=true function destroyself() self.destroy() end")
            cardMasterScript=string.gsub(cardMasterScript, "ciccio", self.getGUID())
            self.putObject(replace)

            taken.setLuaScript(cardMasterScript)
            --taken.setVar("parentBagGUID", self.getGUID())
            --taken.call("showButton")
        else -- SOLO BOTTONI PICCOLI
            Xpos= 8 - actualRowPosition*4
            Zpos= -5 - (actualRowCount-1)*1.2
            cardBtn[i].position={Xpos,YBntPos, Zpos}
            cardBtn[i].label=cardsInside[i].name
            cardBtn[i].click_function="cardFunction"..i
            self.createButton(cardBtn[i])
        end
end
    deckBuilder.call("listReady")
end

function addCard(params)
    table.insert(selectedCardList,#selectedCardList+1, params.name)
    deckBuilder.call("cardSelected")
end

function removeCard(params)
    deckBuilder.call("cardUnselected")
    for k,card in ipairs(selectedCardList) do
        if card == params.name then
            table.remove(selectedCardList, k)
        end
    end
end

-- Card Functions
function cardFunction(i)
    local buttonList=self.getButtons()
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == unselectedFont then -- add card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= selectedFont,  color=selectedColor})
        addCard(buttonList[i+1].label)

    end
    if buttonList[i+1].font_size == selectedFont then --remove card
        self.editButton({index=i, font_size= unselectedFont, color=unselectedColor})
        removeCard(buttonList[i+1].label)
    end
end

Text.Text: PLACE ASSET DECK IN GRAY AREA FOR EXPORTING

MOVEMENT TRAYS

How to use the Movement Trays

Step 1: Select and spawn the desired tray.
Step 2: Make sure your models have the "Grid" flag disabled.
Step 3: Make sure your models have the "Snap" and "Auto Raise" flags enabled.
Step 4: Put your models on the tray.
Step 5: Making sure no other objects are too close to the tray, press the Lock button 
(LMB Apocalypse, RMB 40k)

Apocalypse mode causes the models to be deleted when the tray is deleted.
40k mode leaves the models alone when the tray is deleted.

Due to the janky nature of TTS physics and joints, 
I very VERY EXTREMELY STRONGLY RECCOMEND 
setting your Physics setting to "Locked" in your Config.
It should be set to that anyway to prevent accidental clumping.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())

    })
  end
  end

  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())

  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {

    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())

 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {

    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())

  self.script_state= onSave()

  end

  self.removeButton(0)

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",

    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}

      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
