ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ObjectStates.Name: PlayerPawn

0.title: Instructions
0.body:
INSTRUCTIONS

PREPARING THE ARMY:

Prepare your army placing the miniatures on the army chalk board, be sure that all elements are totally inside the gaming mat, any parts outside of the board will not be saved.


When the army is ready, press the "Export" button and confirm.
You will then have a map only with the army and the board.

ALL objects outside the board will be DELETED.

Then save the map in another local save file or upload it to the workshop.


LOADING THE ARMY:

After loading in and preparing your map, simply ADDITIVE LOAD the save file. Once loaded, click the correct button to place it on your side of the battlefield.


Make sure that nobody loads a new army until the previous one is placed or deleted to prevent physics spaz.
